html: And this shall be a sign unto thee —That is, a sign, or proof that God would do what he had promised, and that Hezekiah would recover and be permitted to go again to the temple of the LordIsaiah 38:22 ;2 Kings 20:8 . On the meaning of the word ’sign,’ seeIsaiah 7:11 , note;Isaiah 7:14 , note; compare the note atIsaiah 37:30 . The promise was, that he should be permitted to go to the temple in three days2 Kings 20:5 .
